languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's ability to withstand the horrors of the warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} (ВОЛ) характеризует способность персонажа противостоять ужасам Варпа и космоса и чудовищным врагам, с которыми неизбежно придется столкнуться в Просторе Коронус. Персонаж с высоким показателем Воли способен вести допрос еретика или подчинить своему влиянию целую толпу.
Также эта характеристика повышает шанс сопротивления ментальным негативным {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектам{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилам{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Willpower reflects the character's ability to withstand the horrors of warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also affects the chances of resisting negative mental effects and psychic powers.

Willpower (WP) reflects a character's ability to withstand the horrors of warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental effects and psychic powers.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to withstand the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g}, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to withstand the horrors of the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}warp{/g}, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}代表角色精神的坚韧程度，代表角色面对亚空间与太空中的恐怖之物，以及面对科罗努斯扩区可怕的敌人时，会在多大程度上抵抗住精神方面的压力。意志高的角色可以操纵人群的行为，还可以审讯异端分子。
此外，意志还可以提高对负面精神{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}的抗性。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's ability to withstand the horrors of the warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}代表角色精神的坚韧程度，代表角色面对亚空间与太空中的恐怖之物，以及面对科罗努斯扩区可怕的敌人时，会在多大程度上抵抗住精神方面的压力。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}意志高的角色可以操纵人群的行为，还可以审讯异端分子。
此外，意志还可以提高对负面精神效果与{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}的抗性。

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}代表角色精神的坚韧程度，代表角色面对{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}亚空间{/g}与太空中的恐怖之物，以及面对{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}可怕的敌人时，会在多大程度上抵抗住精神方面的压力。意志高的角色可以操纵人群的行为，还可以审讯异端分子。
此外，意志还可以提高对负面精神效果与{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}的抗性。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} (VOL) refleja la capacidad de un personaje de resistir los horrores de la disformidad, el terror del espacio y los espantosos oponentes que encontrará en la Extensión de Koronus. Una Voluntad alta permite a los personajes controlar a una muchedumbre o interrogar a un hereje.
También aumenta las probabilidades de resistir {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g} negativos mentales y {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's ability to withstand the horrors of the warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} (VOL) refleja la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de un personaje de resistir los horrores de la disformidad, el terror del espacio y los espantosos oponentes que encontrará en la Extensión de Koronus. Una Voluntad alta permite a los personajes controlar a una muchedumbre o interrogar a un hereje.
También aumenta las probabilidades de resistir efectos negativos mentales y {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}はキャラクターが歪みの恐怖に耐え、コロヌス・エクスパンスで遭遇しうる恐ろしい敵に立ち向かうアビリティを示す。WILが高いほど群衆を支配したり、異端者を尋問したりできる。
また、精神的なマイナス{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}に抵抗する確率が増加する。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's ability to withstand the horrors of the warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}はキャラクターが歪みの恐怖に耐え、コロヌス・エクスパンスで遭遇しうる恐ろしい敵に立ち向かうアビリティを示す。WILが高いほど群衆を支配したり、異端者を尋問したりできる。
また、精神的なマイナス{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}に抵抗する確率が増加する。

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}（WP）はキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}<歪み>{/g}の恐怖に耐え、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で遭遇しうる恐ろしい敵に立ち向かう{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を示す。意志力が高いほど群衆を支配したり、異端者を尋問したりできる。
また、精神的なマイナス効果や{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}に抵抗する確率が増加する。

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} (ВОЛ) характеризует способность персонажа противостоять ужасам Варпа и космоса и чудовищным врагам, с которыми неизбежно придется столкнуться в Просторе Коронус. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} (WK) zeigt die Fähigkeit eines Charakters, dem Horror des Warps, den Schrecken des Weltraums und den fürchterlichen Gegnern, denen er in der Koronus-Ausdehnung begegnen wird, zu widerstehen. Hohe Willenskraft ermöglicht dem Charakter, eine Menschenmenge zu kontrollieren oder einen Ketzer zu verhören. Willenskraft erhöht außerdem die Chance, negativen mentalen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} zu widerstehen.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's ability to withstand the horrors of the warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} (WK) zeigt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Charakters, dem Horror des Warps, den Schrecken des Weltraums und den fürchterlichen Gegnern, denen er in der Koronus-Ausdehnung begegnen wird, zu widerstehen. Hohe Willenskraft ermöglicht es dem Charakter, eine Menschenmenge zu kontrollieren oder einen Ketzer zu verhören. Die Willenskraft erhöht außerdem die Chance, negativen mentalen Effekten und {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräften{/g} zu widerstehen.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} (WK) zeigt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Charakters, dem Horror des {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Warps{/g}, den Schrecken des Weltraums und den fürchterlichen Gegnern, denen er in der Koronus-Ausdehnung begegnen wird, zu widerstehen. Hohe Willenskraft ermöglicht dem Charakter, eine Menschenmenge zu kontrollieren oder einen Ketzer zu verhören. Willenskraft erhöht außerdem die Chance, negativen mentalen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräften{/g} zu widerstehen.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} (FM) reflète la capacité d'un personnage à résister aux horreurs du Warp, aux terreurs de l'espace et aux redoutables adversaires qu'il est amené à croiser dans les Étendues de Koronus. Une Force mentale élevée permet aux personnages de contrôler une foule ou d'interroger un hérétique.
La Force mentale augmente également les chances de résister aux {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} mentaux négatifs et aux {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP) reflects a character's ability to withstand the horrors of the warp, the terrors of space, and the dreadful opponents they are bound to encounter in the Koronus Expanse. High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} (FM) reflète la capacité d'un personnage à résister aux horreurs du Warp, aux terreurs de l'espace et aux redoutables adversaires qu'il est amené à croiser dans les Étendues de Koronus. Une Force mentale élevée permet aux personnages de contrôler une foule ou d'interroger un hérétique.
La Force mentale augmente également les chances de résister aux {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} mentaux négatifs et aux {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.

La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} (VOL) reflète la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à résister aux horreurs du {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Warp{/g}, aux terreurs de l'espace et aux redoutables adversaires qu'il est amené à croiser dans les Étendues de Koronus. Une Volonté élevée permet aux personnages de contrôler une foule ou d'interroger un hérétique.
La Volonté augmente également les chances de résister aux {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} mentaux négatifs et aux {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} (İRA) bir karakterin öteboyutun kâbuslarına, uzayın dehşetlerine ve Koronus Enginliği'nde karşısına çıkacak ürkütücü düşmanlara dayanma kabiliyetini yansıtır. Yüksek İrade, karakterin kalabalık gruplar üzerinde hâkimiyet kurabilmesini veya bir kâfiri sorgulayarak bilgi edinebilmesini sağlar.
Ayrıca olumsuz zihinsel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkilere{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerine{/g} direnme olasılığını artırır.

High Willpower allows characters to exert control over a crowd or interrogate a heretic.
It also increases the chances of resisting negative mental {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
